virtualTable.name: charge_points
virtualTable.sql:
WITH location_power AS (SELECT location_id, max(max_electric_power) max_electric_power FROM evse JOIN connector on evse.id = connector.evse_id GROUP BY location_id)
SELECT location.id, location.lat, location.lon, location.name, location.address, chargepoint_available_count, chargepoint_unknown_count, chargepoint_static_count, chargepoint_bike_count, max_electric_power, geometry FROM location LEFT JOIN (SELECT location_id, COUNT(es.id) as chargepoint_count, SUM(CASE WHEN es.status = 'AVAILABLE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as chargepoint_available_count, SUM(CASE WHEN es.status = 'UNKNOWN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as chargepoint_unknown_count, SUM(CASE WHEN es.status = 'STATIC' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as chargepoint_static_count, SUM(CASE WHEN es.parking_restrictions & 64 = 64 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as chargepoint_bike_count FROM location l JOIN evse es ON l.id = es.location_id GROUP BY location_id) AS cp ON cp.location_id = location.id LEFT JOIN location_power lp ON lp.location_id = location.id
